name: Stationed
description:
Stationed is a Short Story, Narrative, Pixel Art, Game set in a Sci-Fi Universe.

Following the Story or a Ship Engineer who has returned to his old home Route 9 Station after accepting the jack pot on a job. 

This will be the job to set him up for Life.

Note : The First Version of this game is a Play test to see if it sticks. Please opinions and comments are encouraged.
